name: Chocolatier®: Decadence by Design™
description: Travel the globe in search of flavorful and exotic ingredients to customize your own chocolate creations. You’ll use post-World War II economic and technological advances to customize your very own chocolate creations, assist the Baumiesters, and strive to become CEO of your very own chocolate empire!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 2000, XP, XP SP2  Processor: Pentium III 700 MHz Memory: 128 MB Graphics: 3D Video Card, 64 MB recommended DirectX®: 7.0 Hard Drive: 40 MB

reviews.review_text: The Mac System Requirements are wrong!  *** Steam's verison of this game will not work will newer verison of OSX ***
I remember playing this when I was young, wish there was a more recent version :/
Starts out slow and gets more difficult with more recipes and types of candy and countries you have to travel to for ingredients. Decent story line.
